com.googlecode.jsonrpc4j

Class JsonRpcServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.googlecode.jsonrpc4j.JsonRpcBasicServer
      • com.googlecode.jsonrpc4j.JsonRpcServer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    JsonRpcMultiServer

    public class JsonRpcServer
extends JsonRpcBasicServer
    A JSON-RPC request server reads JSON-RPC requests from an input stream and writes responses to an output stream. Supports handler and servlet requests.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.googlecode.jsonrpc4j.JsonRpcBasicServer

        ACCEPT_ENCODING, CODE_OK, CONTENT_ENCODING, DATA, ERROR, ERROR_CODE, ERROR_MESSAGE, EXCEPTION_TYPE_NAME, httpStatusCodeProvider, ID, JSONRPC, JSONRPC_CONTENT_TYPE, METHOD, NAME, NULL, PARAMS, RESULT, VERSION, WEB_PARAM_ANNOTATION_CLASS_LOADER

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      JsonRpcServer(java.lang.Object handler)
      Creates the server with a default ObjectMapper delegating all calls to the given handler.
      JsonRpcServer(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper mapper, java.lang.Object handler)
      Creates the server with the given ObjectMapper delegating all calls to the given handler.
      JsonRpcServer(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper mapper, java.lang.Object handler, java.lang.Class<?> remoteInterface)
      Creates the server with the given ObjectMapper delegating all calls to the given handler Object but only methods available on the remoteInterface.
      JsonRpcServer(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper mapper, java.lang.Object handler, java.lang.Class<?> remoteInterface, boolean gzipResponses)
      Creates the server with the given ObjectMapper delegating all calls to the given handler Object but only methods available on the remoteInterface.

    • Constructor Detail

      • JsonRpcServer

        public JsonRpcServer(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper mapper,
                     java.lang.Object handler,
                     java.lang.Class<?> remoteInterface,
                     boolean gzipResponses)
        Creates the server with the given ObjectMapper delegating all calls to the given handler Object but only methods available on the remoteInterface.
        Parameters:
        mapper - the ObjectMapper
        handler - the handler
        remoteInterface - the interface
        gzipResponses - whether gzip the response that is sent to the client.
